sentences.english: The reasons for keeping them away from everyone else get clearer.
sentences.chinese: 讓槍支遠離其他的所有人，其理由愈益清楚。

sentences.english: As wheeled transportation became more and more common, more and better roads were needed.
sentences.chinese: 輪子運輸變得愈益普通，便需要更多更好的道路。

sentences.english: The Seventeenth National Congress is the symbol of the Party's becoming gradually and fully mature under new situation.
sentences.chinese: 十七大的勝利召開，標誌着黨在新形勢下愈益成熟。

sentences.english: Such renewed solidarity is perhaps yet another expression of globalization," said Dr Danzon on accepting the appointment for his second term.
sentences.chinese: 這種愈益團結或許是迄今爲止全球化的另一種表達。

sentences.english: Grandmother has been getting feebler lately.

definition: increasingly/more and more/ever more/all the more
to become more and more/to gradually become
to reach day after day for
to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge
to become accustomed to sth through long practice
needless to say/it goes without saying
